trait.name: Invigorating Field
entries: When a creature destroys a Convulsing Voidite with a melee attack, it regains 2 ({@dice 1d4}) hit points.

action.name: Distruptive Resonance
entries: A creature within 30 feet of the Convulsing Voidite must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw, or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Psychic damage and has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn. The Convulsing Voidite is destroyed at the end of its turn.

action.name: Explosive Undoing
entries: The Convulsing Voidite explodes, destroying itself. Any creature in a 20-foot radius of the Convulsing Voidite must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw a creature takes 5 ({@damage 2d6}) Piercing damage, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dullahan makes two melee attacks with its Corrupted Blade

action.name: Corrupted Blade (Single Target)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Corrupted Blade (Cleave)
entries: the dullahan slashes in a wide arc with its corrupted blade. Each creature in 15 foot cone must succeed a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage and it is pushed 5 feet away from the dullahan.
Creatures only takes half damage on successful save.

action.name: Rush
entries: The dullahan choose a point that it can see within 40 ft. and move towards it in a straight line without provoking {@action Opportunity Attack}. Each creature that it passes must succeed a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) Slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful save.

bonus.name: Teleport
entries: The dullahan magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reaction.name: Brace
entries: The dullahan adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Knights are warriors who pledge service to rulers, religious orders, and noble causes. A knight's alignment determines the extent to which a pledge is honored. Whether undertaking a quest or patrolling a realm, a knight often travels with an entourage that includes squires and hirelings who are commoners.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: In the first round of combat, the Elven Brigand attacks against any creature with {@status Surprised|XPHB} condition are made with Advantage.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The elven brigand deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the elven brigand (high elf) that does not has the {@condition Incapacitated} condition and the elven brigand doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The elven brigand can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a Bonus Action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven brigand has advantage on saving throws against the  {@condition Charmed} condition, and magic can't put the elven brigand to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Elven Brigand makes 2 weapon attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) Slashing damage.
Has Nick mastery property

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) Piercing damage.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The brigand captain has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the brigand captain to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Brigand Captain makes 2 weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Redeployment
entries: The Brigand Captain chooses an ally within 60 feet, and the ally immediately takes its turn in place of the Brigand Captain's turn.

bonus.name: Courageous Aspect (Recharges: Short or Long Rest)
entries: The Brigand Captain exudes a field of heroism for 1 minute. During this time, the Brigand Captain or any ally within 30 feet of the Brigand Captain is Immune to the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the lictor is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the lictor instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the lictor has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the lictor scores against a creature with {@status Surprised} condition is a critical hit.

trait.name: Crystaline Growth
entries: After the this creature dies, a {@creature Convulsing Voidite|crownmisery} grows out of its body the following round on its Initiative.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Invisibility
entries: The lictor magically give itself the {@condition Invisible} condition until it attacks or casts a spell, or until its {@status concentration} ends (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The lumberjack has Advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Electrical Suspectibility
entries: If the Lumberjack takes Lightning damage while Bloodied, it must make Constitution saving throw ({@dc 5} + the damage taken). On a failed save it has the {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn.
The Lumberjack automatically fails this save if the hit is a Critical Hit.

trait.name: Momentum
entries: If the lumberjack moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with an attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or it gets the {@condition Prone} condition.

trait.name: Crystaline Growth
entries: After the this creature dies, a {@creature Convulsing Voidite|crownmisery} grows out of its body the following round on its Initiative.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lumberjack can attack twice with its Circular Saw. It can't use the same attack twice.

action.name: Chainsaw (Single Target)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Chainsaw (Cleave)
entries: the Lumberjack slashes in a wide arc wit its Chainsaw. Each creature in 15 foot cone must succeed a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage or half as much on successful save.

bonus.name: Rocket Booster (2/Short Rest)
entries: The lumberjack moves up to its Speed toward a hostile creature that it can see, with its rocket booster.

trait.name: Crystaline Growth
entries: After the this creature dies, a {@creature Convulsing Voidite|crownmisery} grows out of its body the following round on its Initiative.

action.name: Shamble
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} 10 ({@damage 2d8 + 1}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Implant
entries: The Rabble throws shards of crystals at creature within 15 feet of itself. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or is covered in crystals and takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) radiant damage at the beginning of each of its turns for one minute or until the target creature or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to remove the seeds.

action.name: Regenerate (1/Short Rest)
entries: The Rabble regains 9 ({@dice 2d8}) hit points.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Tainted can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a Bonus Action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Time Rend (2/Short Rest)
entries: After taking damage, Tainted's can double its Speed until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Tainted can make 2 attack(s)

action.name: Slash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Flurry (Only when Bloodied)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.
